remarks:
If ` y ` is not free in ` ph ` , ` x ` is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` .  (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.)

 If ` y ` is not free in ` ph ` , ` x ` is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` .  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
hbsb3.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) $.
hbsb3 $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph -> A. x [ y / x ] ph ) $.
